Music-Indexer
Program to index music files and their metadata in C++20, with the intention to be used as a backend for a music player.

Variable Documentation

◆ data_dir

std::string Midx::data_dir
inline

The directory where the indexer stores album art and other data. By default it's "~/.local/share/music-indexer", it's better to modify it to be inside your project's data directory (e.g. "~/.local/share/music-player/indexer-data").

Note
In case it's modified, make sure Midx::data_dir exists and the value doesn't end with a '/'.
Todo:
modify default value to work on other platforms.

Album art is stored in the file Midx::data_dir/id_of_corresponding_album.

  • Midx
  • Generated by 1.9.8
